title: Basic SpeechRecognition tutorial
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to use your smartphone to recognize what you are saying.

Select **AudioPlayer** to make your smartphone vibrate

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/AudioPlayer-Item.png)

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open the camera locally.

Move the **play**

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/SpeechRecognition/text.png) and the **stop**

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/audioplayer/stop.png)

components into the workspace
Go to youtube and get the short url of a video and paste it in the play component.

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/images/Timing/Timing.png) on the sidebar,

move the **delay** ![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Timing/delay-component.png)
and put the components as in the image

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/audioplayer/image.png)
this is for you to see on the console what your smartphone is recognizing from what you are saying
